resources.string: This application creates several subclasses using Byte Buddy and loads these classes using Byte Buddy\'s class loading strategy for Android. For this to work, one needs to manually add the Android SDK\'s dex compiler \'dex.jar\' before deploying this application. Because of the SDK\'s license agreement, it is not permitted to distribute this dex compiler outside of the SDK. It is the responsibility of the user of this application to fulfill this license agreement.
It seems like the required \'dx.jar\' was not added to the application. Please redeploy this application after adding this jar file.
